name: Stock Summary Finish Good Detail
query:
select a.item_name as "Item Name::170",
     a.item_code as "Item Code::180",
     a.item_group as "Item Group:Link/Item Group:50",
     a.division_group as "Division Group::50",
     a.retail_group as "Retail Group::50",
     a.price_list as "Price::80",
     sum(a.actual_qty) as "Stok Gudang:Float:85",
     sum(a.planned_qty) as "Stok Masuk:Float:85",
     sum(a.delivered_qty) as "Sudah Dikirim:Float:85",
     sum(a.reserved_qty) as "Akan Dikirim:Float:85",
	 sum(a.projected_qty) as "Stok Akhir:Float:85",
	 	 replace(a.warehouse,' - ISS','') as "Warehouse:Link/Warehouse:160"
     from
     (
     SELECT
       a.item_name ,
       a.item_code ,
       a.item_group ,
       a.division_group ,
       a.retail_group ,
       a.brand ,
       format(max(d.price_list_rate),0) as "price_list",
       b.actual_qty ,
       c.delivered_qty ,
       b.reserved_qty as "reserved_qty",
       b.projected_qty ,
      (b.planned_qty+b.ordered_qty+b.indented_qty) as "planned_qty",
       b.warehouse 
     FROM `tabItem` a LEFT JOIN `tabBin` b
         ON a.item_code = b.item_code
     LEFT JOIN `tabSales Order Item` c
         ON a.item_code = c.item_code
     LEFT JOIN `tabItem Price` d
         ON a.item_code = d.item_code
     where substring(b.warehouse,1,3) = '901'
     group by a.item_code, b.warehouse) a
     where a.reserved_qty > 0 or a.actual_qty > 0 or a.projected_qty > 0
     group by a.item_name,a.item_code,a.item_group,a.division_group,a.retail_group,a.price_list,a.warehouse 
         order by a.item_name asc;
